code:
Generate a competitive programming problem, return a JSON like the following one: Default constraints: 256mb 1ms
{
    "Name": "Pirate's Treasure Count",
    "Statement": "Captain Jack Sparrow has just finished a successful treasure hunt on various islands. He wants to count his total loot but he's not very good at math. Help him add up the gold coins he found on each island. Jack visited $n$ islands and collected a certain number of gold coins from each. Your task is to help him calculate the total number of gold coins he has acquired during his adventure.",
    "Input": "The first line contains a single integer $n$ ($1 \le n \le 100$), the number of islands Jack visited. The second line contains $n$ space-separated integers $a_1, a_2, ..., a_n$ ($0 \le a_i \le 1000$), where $a_i$ represents the number of gold coins Jack found on the $i$-th island.",
    "Output": "Output a single integer â€” the total number of gold coins Jack collected from all the islands.",
    "Sample Input": "5\n10 20 30 40 50",
    "Sample Output": "150",
    "Notes": "Jack visited 5 islands and collected 10, 20, 30, 40, and 50 gold coins respectively. The total sum is 10 + 20 + 30 + 40 + 50 = 150 gold coins."
}

You'll receive some information for create the problem
Language ( The language that all information of the problem should be described, by default English )
Problem Idea ( The idea of the problem, you must create the problem thinking on this idea, by default create one )
Problem Topics ( The topics that the solution of the problem must contain, by default choose )
Problem Level ( Easy, Medium or Hard, by default choose one )
